name: AdGuard Home
description: Ensures AdGuard Home DNS blocker is active.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active AdGuardHome || echo skip; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service AdGuardHome status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running && echo active || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart AdGuardHome || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service AdGuardHome restart || true; fi
